snippet.title: Lenin's Mausoleum \- Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
snippet.description:
* Lenin's Mausoleum \- Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lenin%27s_Mausoleum Cached
* History| * Preserving the body| * Lenin's Mausoleum today| * See also
Lenin's Mausoleum also known as Lenin's Tomb, situated in Red Square in the center of Moscow, is the mausoleum that serves as the current resting place of Vladimir Lenin.
